title: Bloomberg Markets: May Tries to Keep Team Intact Post Vote
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: May Tries to Keep Team Intact Post Vote
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Edward Ludlow U.K. Correspondent Bloomberg News Discussing Theresa May keeping her top five ministers in place as the U.K. prime minister tries to shore up her position among Conservatives after a devastating electoral blow that wiped out their majority.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
